headline: Can Stanley Black & Decker’s (SWK) Dividend and Leadership Shifts Reveal a New Strategic Focus?
summary: Stanley Black & Decker’s Board of Directors has approved a regular fourth quarter cash dividend of US$0.83 per share, payable on December 16, 2025, to shareholders of record as of December 1, 2025; the company also announced several leadership changes, including a new President & CEO and a resignation from its General Counsel. This combination of continued dividend payments and executive transitions underscores management’s ongoing commitment to shareholder returns while signaling a period...

headline: Mary Laschinger Elected to Stanley Black & Decker Board of Directors
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK) today announced that Mary Laschinger, former Chair and Chief Executive Officer of Veritiv Corporation, has been elected to the company's Board of Directors effective November 1, 2025.

raw.headline: Mary Laschinger Elected to Stanley Black & Decker Board of Directors

headline: Stanley Black Gears Up to Report Q3 Earnings: What's in the Offing?
summary: SWK preps for Q3 results, with DEWALT strength and cost cuts offsetting DIY and industrial softness.
